mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yisheng_chat_issue_text as yishengChatIssueText ,a.issue_time as issueTime ,a.yisheng_chat_reply_text as yishengChatReplyText ,a.reply_time as replyTime ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.yisheng_chat_types as yishengChatTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
